ttl.name: REAR NO. 1 SEAT INNER BELT ASSEMBLY (for Captain Seat Type)

item.ptxt: Use the same procedure for the RH and LH sides.
The procedure listed below is for the RH side.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR SEAT INNER CUSHION SHIELD RH

s2.ptxt: Detach the rear part of the rear seat inner cushion shield RH in the order shown in the illustration, and then detach the claw and remove the rear seat inner cushion shield RH.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 1 SEAT INNER BELT ASSEMBLY RH

s2.ptxt: Remove the nut and rear No. 1 seat inner belt assembly RH.
Remove the rear seat belt anchor plate.
